nodes.text: Iania was a Twi'lek female who the Rebel Alliance Captain Micha Evon had feelings for when both of them were at school. Evon later remembered the Twi'lek in 0 ABY when talking to the young private Hazram Namir on the planet Vir Aphshire.
Iania was mentioned in the 2015 novel Battlefront: Twilight Company, written by Alexander Freed.
